text_e: 3 points for each prisoner in your dungeon
when acieved place up to 2 critters from your city beneath this event. 3 points for each critter beneath this event
when achieved you may place up to 3 wood here 2 points for each wood on this event
3 points for each buried worker in your cemetary
when achieved draw 1 card 1 any for each point on your chapel. 2 points for each point on your chapel
When achieved you may place up to 3 berries here. 2 points for each berry on this event
when achieved reveal 5 cards you may draw any or place any beneath this event. 1 point for each card beneath this event
when achieved you may place up to 3 any here for each berry or wood 1 point for each resin and stone 2 points
when achieved bring back one of your deployed workers
when achieved you may give oppenents up to a total of 3 any. 2 points for each donation
when achieved pay 2 berries and discard 2 cards from your city. 6 points
Whenachieved you may place up to 3 critters from you hand beneath this event
3 points for each worker in your monastery
3 points for each harvester gatherer pair in the city
